RumorFact.Text: Hornfels told me about a Hearthian explorer named Acetate that went missing during one of their expeditions. The last place anyone saw them was at the Lunar Outpost, on the Attlerock. I wonder if Esker knows anything.
Esker said that Acetate wanted to scout a good location for the Deep Space Satellite before starting their most recent expedition.

ExploreFact.Text: I found the Hearthian Deep Space Satellite at the edge of the solar system!
Gabbro investigated the satellite at Hornfels' request, and found no apparent issues with any of the equipment.
According to Esker, the missing Hearthian explorer Acetate went to find an ideal orbital path for the satellite before they disappeared.
